channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump flips and re-nominates Jared Isaacman to lead NASA
item.description: The reversal comes after weeks of pressure from people like Elon Musk, who accused Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy of being ill-equipped for the j...

item.title: NVIDIA, Qualcomm join U.S., Indian VCs to help build India’s next deep tech startups
item.description: Qualcomm Ventures has joined six Indian venture firms, collectively adding more than $850 million to boost India’s deep-tech ecosystem.

item.title: Former Meta employees launch a ring to take voice notes and control music
item.description: A raft of voice-based hardware devices have emerged, aimed at companionship, productivity, or personal growth. These include card-shaped devices from ...

item.title: Goldman Sachs doubles down on MoEngage in new round to fuel global expansion
item.description: MoEngage already has customers across 75 countries, with North America being its biggest business driver.

item.title: Rivian creates another spinoff company called Mind Robotics
item.description: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.

item.title: Amazon sends legal threats to Perplexity over agentic browsing
item.description: Amazon won't allow agents on its site that don't identify themselves as such. Perplexity is not pleased.

item.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
item.description: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of ...

item.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new Co-Stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
item.description: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Botha passed the leadership baton to Lin and Grady.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
item.description: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across...

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (November 2025)
item.description: Fire and Water: Making The Avatar Films, Marvel Zombies, and Doctor Who are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.
